title: An enquiry into the reasons for abrogating the test imposed on all members of Parliament offered by Sa. Oxon.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: Written by Gilbert Burnet.  Cf. Wing.
A reply to Samuel Parker's Reasons for abrogating the test imposed upon all members of Parliament.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
